statements: DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE student_id = 123 AND attendance < 80;
DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE performance < 70 OR overall_progress < 60;
DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE student_id = 456 AND performance < 50 AND overall_progress < 40;
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 2 AND subject = 'Math'
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 123 AND date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 456 AND exam_date = '2022-03-15' AND score < 60;
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE subject = 'Math' AND score BETWEEN 70 AND 80;
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE grade < 60 AND subject = 'Math';
DELETE FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 50 AND feedback LIKE '%improve%'
